description: This file appears to be a Python source code file that defines functions for emitting C++ code related to JSON RPC mechanisms, including registration, deregistration, event emission, and versioning. It processes a schema or root object representing RPC definitions and generates corresponding C++ code snippets for an RPC framework.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code to emit a specific event based on its schema and parameters.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue code for the RPC implementation, including includes, namespace declarations, and version info.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the epilogue code closing namespaces for the RPC implementation.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace with static version constants.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Handles the core code generation for registering and unregistering RPC methods and events.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main entry to generate the full RPC code, including prologue, core code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates version code for RPC schema and calls prologue/epilogue functions.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
